title: Revelations
description: alternate cover edition of ASIN B0849PBFKRRiley thought he knew what to expect from college, but he never planned for angels, demons, or a team of attractive, overprotective Guardians.When one fateful night opens his eyes to a world he never knew existed, Riley Shepard must navigate a host of supernatural dangers, all while struggling with new and confusing feelings for his guardian angels.
